item.title: 360 Security and iQIYI have secured the top positions in the App Annie download rankings
item.description:
360 Security, an Android mobile antivirus and performance app, climbed to 6th place on Google Play’s download chart, making it the 6th most downloaded app worldwide in July, according to the App Annie Index. This achievement is attributed to increased consumer awareness of mobile security and recent campaigns in Korea and Japan. 360 Security provides users with virus protection, memory optimization, and power-saving features. The App Annie report indicates a global surge in popularity for security apps, including 360 Security...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/360-security-and-iqiyi-have-secured-the-top-positions-in-the-app-annie-download-rankings/
